trans-unit.source: An inline flow content element that causes a line break to occur in flow content.
trans-unit.target: 造成非固定格式內容發生分行的內嵌非固定格式內容項目。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Documents.LineBreak> to start a new line of text.
Unlike other <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Inline> objects, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.LineBreak> does not allow child elements.
trans-unit.target: 不同於其他<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Inline>物件<xref:System.Windows.Documents.LineBreak>不允許子元素。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new, default instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.LineBreak" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.LineBreak" /> 類別預設的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer" /> specifying an insertion position at which to insert the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.LineBreak" /> element after it is created, or <see langword="null" /> for no automatic insertion.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer" />，指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.LineBreak" /> 項目在建立之後所要插入的位置，<see langword="null" /> 表示不會自動插入。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.LineBreak" /> class, and inserts the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.LineBreak" /> at a specified position.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.LineBreak" /> 類別的新執行個體，並在指定的位置插入新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.LineBreak" />。
